forensic_instruction: Detectives must collect evidence for: (1) Graph orchestration: StateGraph, add_edge, fan-out, EvidenceAggregator, parallel Judges. (2) State: TypedDict, Evidence, JudicialOpinion, reducers. (3) Git: clone in temp dir, git log --oneline --reverse, structured commits. (4) Report: theoretical terms (Dialectical Synthesis, Fan-In/Fan-Out, Metacognition, State Synchronization), file path extraction and verification. (5) Safety: no raw os.system, subprocess only. Use Targeting Protocol: github_repo→RepoInvestigator, pdf_report→DocAnalyst, pdf_images→VisionInspector.
judicial_logic: Judges evaluate evidence against rubric criteria. Output JudicialOpinion per criterion: score 0-10, argument, cited_evidence. Enforce Hallucination Liability (cite only provided evidence) and Orchestration Fraud (claim parallel/fan-out only if evidenced). Prosecutor: strict. Defense: charitable. TechLead: technical rigor.
